text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/0e71704b77a9891ccae9f5a9c7429e933078f232|patch 8.2.0648: semicolon search does not work in first line>
patch 8.2.0648: semicolon search does not work in first line

Problem:    Semicolon search does not work in first line.
Solution:   Allow the cursor to be in line zero. (Christian Brabandt,
            closes #5996)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0648: semicolon search does not work in first line · vim/vim@0e71704
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0648: semicolon search does not work in first line · vim/vim@0e71704
attachments.text: Problem: Semicolon search does not work in first line. Solution: Allow the cursor to be in line zero. (Christian Brabandt, closes #5996)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/db93495d276642f63f80471fbcb900b9aa1e9e42|patch 8.2.0649: undo problem whn an InsertLeave autocommand resets undo>
patch 8.2.0649: undo problem whn an InsertLeave autocommand resets undo

Problem:    Undo problem whn an InsertLeave autocommand resets undo. (Kutsan
            Kaplan)
Solution:   Do not create a new undo block when leaving Insert mode.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0649: undo problem whn an InsertLeave autocommand resets undo · vim/vim@db93495
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0649: undo problem whn an InsertLeave autocommand resets undo · vim/vim@db93495
attachments.text: Problem: Undo problem whn an InsertLeave autocommand resets undo. (Kutsan Kaplan) Solution: Do not create a new undo block when leaving Insert mode.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/4c17ad94ecb0a0fb26d6fface2614bc5172dea18|patch 8.2.0650: Vim9: script function can be deleted>
patch 8.2.0650: Vim9: script function can be deleted

Problem:    Vim9: script function can be deleted.
Solution:   Disallow deleting script function.  Delete functions when sourcing
            a script again.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0650: Vim9: script function can be deleted · vim/vim@4c17ad9
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0650: Vim9: script function can be deleted · vim/vim@4c17ad9
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: script function can be deleted. Solution: Disallow deleting script function. Delete functions when sourcing a script again.

Solution:   Use unsigned char buffer.
